about_the_game: OVR Advanced Settings is a desktop overlay application for SteamVR, giving you a wide array of settings, and utilities all while in VR.
detailed_description:
Features

  • Space Drag: The ability to virtually move yourself in VR based upon your hand position
  • Space Turn: The ability to virtually turn yourself based on your controller orientation
  • Fix Floor: Ability to quickly set your floor height by placing your controller on the ground
  • Push-To-Talk/Push-To-Mute: ability to un-mute/mute your mic on a button press
  • Universal Snap/Smooth Turn: Add snap turning/smooth turning to ANY SteamVR game
  • Brightness Control: Ability to Simulate different levels of brightness inside your HMD
  • Lighthouse Device Pairing: Selectively pair your Lighthouse devices (index controllers, vive wands, vive trackers, tundra trackers, etc.) to your selected wireless Dongle
  • Per-App Control Bindings: Create SteamVR bindings for overlay applications to apply on a per-app basis
  • Player Height Toggle
  • Control audio devices, volumes and mirror devices
  • and much much more...


    Compatibility and Disclaimers

    Due to the wide-array of headsets and features, not every Feature will work with every headset.

    If you encounter an issue please reach out via our , or the steam community pages.

    Intel ARC GPU users – Dashboard Rendering does not properly work, and you will need to use desktop mode.

    Some multi-GPU/Laptop systems will have problems rendering in the Dashboard, and you may have to run the overlay in Desktop Mode.

    Trailer Music:
    "Astra" By NAND


    About the Software

    OVR Advanced Settings is a desktop overlay application for SteamVR, giving you a wide array of settings, and utilities all while in VR.

short_description: OVR Advanced Settings is a Dashboard Application for VR, that allows you to access many settings. OVRAS also has a myriad of utility features such as: simulated movement, adding smooth/snap turn to any game, video controls for the headset such as brightness, per-app bindings and much more.
